bio:
Brecius is a member of the criminal gang Thorina's Cutters and a bodyguard to Thorina herself. Others call him "Enchanter Brecius". You can be found in the tower of the Cutters' headquarters at Cutpurse Hideout, where he will attack intruders on sight, alongside Thorina and fellow bodyguard Snipes-Many-Innocents.
Brecius is equipped with bandit mage armor and melee weapons. He also carries a random assortment of items, including lockpicks, food, jewelry, soul gems, ingredients, books, spell tomes, and an enchanted staff.
name: Enchanter Brecius
